    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rational(double n) 
      Rational(double a, double b)
      Rational Constructor takes integers "a" (numerator) and "b" (denominator) as arguments and updates the numerator and denominator and normalizes them
      Rational(java.lang.String str)
      Rational Constructor takes a String "str" as argument and splits them up where the delimiter is and stores them in variable numerator and denominator
